trans-unit.source: Contains classes that support interoperation of Windows Forms and WPF controls.
trans-unit.target: Contient des classes qui prennent en charge l’interopérabilité des contrôles Windows Forms et WPF.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration> namespace contains classes that enable interoperation between the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration> espace de noms contient des classes qui permettent l’interopérabilité entre le [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] et [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies.

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration> classes, you can host [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controls on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] pages, and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based applications.
trans-unit.target: Lorsque vous utilisez <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration> classes, vous pouvez héberger [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] contrôles [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] pages, et [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] éléments dans [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-en fonction des applications.

trans-unit.source: The two key classes that implement interoperation capabilities are <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>.
trans-unit.target: Les deux principales classes qui implémentent les fonctions d’interopérabilité sont <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> et <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>.

trans-unit.source: Which class you use depends on your control implementation:
trans-unit.target: La classe que vous utilisez dépend de votre implémentation de contrôle :

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] page.
trans-unit.target: Utilisez le <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> classe lorsque vous devez utiliser un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control sur un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] page.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application.
trans-unit.target: Utilisez le <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> classe lorsque vous devez utiliser un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] élément dans un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-application basée sur.
